title: Cod curry
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 knob root ginger, grated', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '2 teaspoons ground coriander', '1 teaspoon cardamom', '1/2 teaspoon turmeric', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 fresh green chillies, seeded and diced', 'handful chopped fresh coriander', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '450g (1 lb) cod fillets, cut into chunks']
